title: Peri hypsous, or Dionysius Longinus of the height of eloquence. Rendred out of the originall. By J.H. Esq;
author: Longinus, 1st cent.
publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel for Francis Eaglesfield at the Marygold in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: A translation of: Longinus.  De sublimitate.
The attribution to Dionysius Cassius Longinus is spurious.
Title page printed in red and black; first two words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
